import React, { useState } from 'react'; import { Outlet, Link, useLocation } from 'react-router-dom'; import { useAuth } from '../context/AuthContext'; import { HomeIcon, ClipboardDocumentListIcon, UserIcon, SunIcon, MoonIcon, Bars3Icon, XMarkIcon, ArrowRightOnRectangleIcon } from '@heroicons/react/24/outline'; const Layout = ({ darkMode, setDarkMode }) => { const [sidebarOpen, setSidebarOpen] = useState(false); const { logout, user } = useAuth(); const location = useLocation(); const navigation = [ { name: 'Dashboard', href: '/dashboard', icon: HomeIcon }, { name: 'Tasks', href: '/tasks', icon: ClipboardListIcon }, { name: 'Profile', href: '/profile', icon: UserIcon }, ]; const isActive = (path) => location.pathname === path; return (
{/* Mobile sidebar */}
setSidebarOpen(false)}>

TaskFlow

{navigation.map((item) => ( setSidebarOpen(false)} > {item.name} ))}

{user?.username}

{user?.email}

{/* Desktop sidebar */}

TaskFlow

{navigation.map((item) => ( {item.name} ))}

{user?.username}

{user?.email}

{/* Main content */}
{/* Top navigation */}

{navigation.find(nav => isActive(nav.href))?.name || 'Dashboard'}

{/* Page content */}
); }; export default Layout;
